articles.content: The 20-year-old, who celebrates his birthday on the same day as his new contract and loan opportunity, will now gain vital experience while continuing his development in the top tier of Belgian footb… [+3112 chars]

articles.author: Dominic Hogan
articles.title: Emile Smith Rowe reveals why Arsenal signing Fabio Vieira is similar to Bernardo Silva. - Daily Mail
articles.description: Smith Rowe likened Vieira, who arrived this summer on a deal worth a potential £34million, to Manchester City star Bernardo Silva, whilst also claiming that new No 9 Jesus has already made an impact.
articles.content:
Arsenal and England star Emile Smith Rowe has heaped praise on Mikel Arteta's  recent signings Gabriel Jesus and Fabio Vieira after an impressive start to the Gunners' pre-season preparations.
